name: Struggle For Light (itch)
description:
Struggle For Light is a top-down, local multiplayer, twin stick shooter with an old-school feel.

With up to 4 players, pick up weapons and upgrades, dodge bullets, kill your friends and be the last one standing !

*Easy to play, hard to master 

*Old-school fast-paced gameplay, with rounds between 45 to 90 seconds

*Up to 4 players local multiplayer

*Team mode for 2vs2 action

*12 different items and upgrades

*20 different levels with specific layout and hazards

*7 different characters to choose from

Note : this game is local multiplayer only

a gamepad controller per player is necessary
